name: lineup-builder
description: Constructs a baseball lineup based on players, positions, and user-defined rules.

scripts.test: npm run build && tape dist/test/**/*.test.js | tap-notify | tap-diff
scripts.build: babel main -d dist/main && babel test -d dist/test

author: Justin Makeig <jmpublic+github@makeig.com> (https://www.github.com/jmakeig)
